scenario_text.value:
The barricade’s down?! Then this place isn’t
safe any longer!

What’ll we do, Takuma?! We won’t stand
a chance if they attack!
There’s only one entrance. Nowhere to run...

Are, are we gonna have to fight again?
Those things are so strong...
Miu, are...are you trembling?!

No! This, this is... I just...got a cramp...
in both legs!
Now’s not the time for this crap!
And you, keep your cool!
Urk... My bad. I’m just...
If only we had a way to get out of here...

Unfortunately there are no other passageways.
To be frank, the situation is quite dire.

(We have to find some way to turn the tables!
Otherwise, we’re done for!)
Ahhh, dammit! We can think things over later!

We’re sitting ducks for those Kenzoku if we
stick around! So...I’ll go crush ’em!

If that’s how you’re feeling, I’ll join the
party!

Ah, wait a moment, Kaito! Such rash actions
will only—

If we just wait around here, they’ll come for
us anyway! I’m going!
Ah, wait, Kaito!

Oh no, there he goes. Not the safest time to
venture out on your own...

Sheesh... That guy sure picked a good time to
lose his shit!

What shall we do, Minoru? I will fight too,
if that is your wish.
I’ll follow him. Leave Kaito to me!
Huh?! Hey, wait, Miu!
Now both brother and sister are crazy!

What he said! Weren’t you shaking in your
boots just a second ago?!

Yeah... Yeah, I’m scared. So scared I can
barely take it.
Then...

I’m scared of putting any more people I care
about in such awful situations!

That’s why... I’m gonna go save my brother!
Shakomon, please! Help me!
Of course! I was gonna from the get-go!
Miu...
Oh no... Now even Miu’s gone.
What in blazes...

Um, well let’s try not to split up any more
than...
Uh...sorry, guys.
You are?

Saki, don’t tell me you plan on going after
them, too?
No, it’s not that...

There might be some of those little guys left
behind somewhere in the amusement park.
You may be right, Saki, but now’s not the—

Seeing all those creatures get hurt... Seeing
Miu all worked-up like that...

I... I can’t just stand by and watch! I...
I’m gonna go help!
Ah, wait! I’ll come too, Saki!
Saki! Floramon!
I didn’t expect Saki to run off, too...

But why... Everyone knows how dangerous it is
to go off by yourself...
The rest of you, don’t go off on your own!
Calm down, Aoi!

Labramon’s right, you know. No need for us to
get panicked, too.

Yes. Yes, you’re right. Breathe in, breathe
out... Okay, I’m fine now.
Sorry, I’ve calmed down a little.
So what do we do now, Takuma?

We can’t just wait around here... I think we
should go after Saki and Kaito, but...

Yes, I would’ve liked all of us to take
action together, but...

We should split up and go look for the
others!

I’ll run after Saki. Takuma, please take care
of Kaito and Miu!
And what should I do, then?!

Come with me, Minoru! You too if you can,
Professor!

Saki is right. There may be some stragglers
left behind. We have to protect them.
Very well. I will join you.
Falcomon! It’s time to get pumped!

Indeed! “Get pumped” I shall! Everyone, try
not to do anything reckless!
It’s a bit too late for that...
Aoi?
Ah, it’s nothing. Come on, let’s go!
Let’s go too, Takuma!
Yeah! We’ll go after Kaito and Miu!
